medical_history.chief_complaint: Diffuse abdominal pain with localized RLQ pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 24 hours ago, evolving from diffuse abdominal pain to localized right lower quadrant (RLQ) pain. The patient also experienced anorexia and nausea but no vomiting, fevers, chills, or diarrhea.
